nodes.text: Ryca Narwe was a man, who was employed by Eyar Treatment Systems as a third-class maintenance technician during the time of the Galactic Civil War. He worked in the Eyar City sewer.

Narwe was under-motivated by his job and would spend his time trying to do as little work as he could get away with. However, despite his laziness, he was a competent technician. Narwe was rude and crass, so his superiors didn't assign him any partners.
